    • writeToDocx

      public boolean writeToDocx​(String fileName, String docTitle, String[] prompt)
      Writes an array of strings into a .docx file, with a given title as an argument
      Parameters:
      fileName - the file name
      docTitle - the document title
      prompt - An array of texts inside the paragraphs - might include decorator to indicate the style and alignment of the text example for one of the prompts: -CENTER~example where "-CENTER" indicates the text would be aligned at the center with the default style, and "~" indicates the end of the decorator The method assumes that no-decorator prompt corresponds to "-LEFT~" prompt
      Returns:
